title: 地皮世界不生怪
author: yuhang5198
txt_content: 如题 我有多世界的MultiWorld

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content: 把多世界文件传输下来，用notepad++打开，把其中的difficult修改成0

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content: 望采纳，建议楼主用mv多世界插件这个功能更全

replies.author: qrbqrb4728116
replies.txt_content: 直接打指令/mv modify set diff 0

replies.author: 胡来的
replies.txt_content: 既然有装多世界管理插件直接在配置里面改就好

要让地皮不生怪？输入/difficulty 0即可
要让地皮生怪？输入/difficulty 1即可

replies.author: a1457370814
replies.txt_content: 关掉生成动物/mv modify set animals false 世界名 关掉生成怪物/mv modify set monsters false 世界名         求采纳求人气
